name: §a§nFearmonger II
description: You are fueled by fear and deliberately intend to spread fear wherever you go.

text: §a§nFear
Fear is a debuff that will reduce:
§c-§r Movement Speed by §c15§r%
§c-§r Attack Speed by §c10§r%
§c-§r Attack Damage by §c1§r
Per Level
These effects stack with §cSlowness§r, §cMining Fatigue§r, and §cWeakness§r
§a§nFear Detection
Being an Origin empowered by fear, you can detect nearby terrified prey.
§nExplanation§r:
You can detect nearby entities that are under the §cFear§r debuff in a §a60§r block radius.
§a§nHysteria
Fear spreads fear and that fear spreads more fear.
§nExplanation§r:
[§a20 Second Cooldown§r]
Killing any entities with the §cFear§r debuff will spread §cFear§r to other entities like a Fear Pulse.
After §a1.25§r / §a1.5§r seconds from the kill, entities in a §a6§r / §a9§r block radius will receive §cFear§r for §c10§r / §c7.5§r seconds
§e§nFear Usurper I
You become stronger by absorbing the fear from your targets. However, you can also become weaker when your targets no longer fear you.
§nExplanation§r:
You have a Fear meter that determines how much Fear you have absorbed and lost. The meter ranges from -5 (§eYellow§r) to 5 (§aGreen§r)
§eYellow§r: Taking hits (with the Smite enchantmnet) will subtract §c1§r (§c2§r) from the meter.
At §eMIN§r Stacks: targets that hit you will get rid of the §cFear§r debuff from themselves and you will lose §c2§r Hunger Points and Saturation per hit.
§aGreen§r: Dealing damage to targets (with the §cFear§r debuff) will add §a1§r (§a2§r) to the meter.
At §aMAX§r Stacks: hitting targets will receive §cFear§r for §c5§r seconds and you will gain §a1§r Hunger Point and Saturation per hit.
Stacks will decay when out of combat for 15 seconds, decaying at a rate of §e1§r every §e2§r seconds.
